Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Wacker/Harbor
ShortDescription: Northbound 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore, Monroe, Michigan, Wacker & Columbus: due to, street blockage near Wacker/Harbor

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore, Monroe, Michigan, Wacker and Columbus: due to, street blockage near Wacker/Harbor.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

ShortDescription: Northbound 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus and Wacker : due to, street blockage near Stetson/Randolph.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus and Wacker : due to, street blockage near Stetson/Randolph.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Adams/Wabash
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Adams/Wabash due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown trains are standing at Adams/Wabash due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

As a result of the delayed train, Brown Line trains have been rerouted via in the Inner Loop track. Please board Brown Line trains on the Orange Line side of the stations on the Loop "L". 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
